name: Intersteller Inclusion
description:
Interseteller Inclusion is a narrative based sci-fi game where you want other aliens to help join your team, so you can fight for equality on your home planet!

Made By:

Helen - @HGiapitzakis
Jess - @jessvovers
Alex - @AlexLDouglass

Controls:

WASD/Arrows - Move
E - initiate conversation
Space/Left-click - Continue conversation
ESC - Menu

Assets

Dialogue: RPG Talk

Sprites:
Retro Sprite Font and Icons
Pixel slime

UI: UI pack: Space extension from Kenney.nl

Environment:
Scy-Fy Platformer Indoor Tileset from KIIRA
Space Base Platform Shooter from sitebender
Tiling from Sarah
